ffffs006 Emotional Modifier
Rarity: Super Rare
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Emotional Modifier
EQUIP: Any. UNEQUIP: Drop. EFFECT: FREE: Choose one of the following to last until you choose again: Fear: Opposing characters within 4 squares modify defense -1. Doubt: Opposing characters within 4 squares modify attack -1. Hate: Characters within 4 squares and line of fire can use Battle Fury. Light Object.
10 Points
